name: Ice Bite Support
mods: Supported Skills have (50–69)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing a Frozen Enemy
Supported Skills have 15% chance to Freeze
Supported Skills have (2–15) to (3–23) added Cold Damage per Frenzy Charge
Supported Skills have (8–69) to (12–103) added Cold Damage
description: Supports any skill you use to hit enemies yourself. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines.

mods.text: Supported Skills deal % increased Damage with Hits against Frozen Enemies
Supported Skills deal % increased Damage per Frenzy Charge
Supported Skills have % chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing a Frozen Enemy
